allow: Bash(npx playwright test tests/playwright/messenger.e2e.spec.js --grep "успешный вход через UI")
Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret node --test tests/unit/auth.test.js tests/unit/api.test.js tests/unit/validation.test.js tests/e2e/chat_e2e.test.js)

Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret node --test tests/unit/auth.test.js tests/unit/api.test.js tests/unit/validation.test.js tests/integration/messages-integration.test.js tests/e2e/chat_e2e.test.js)

Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret node --test tests/unit/auth.test.js tests/unit/api.test.js tests/unit/websocket.test.js tests/unit/validation.test.js tests/unit/sanitize.test.js tests/unit/pagination.test.js tests/unit/apiVersioning.test.js tests/unit/fileValidation.test.js tests/unit/csrf.test.js tests/unit/sanitizeLogs.test.js tests/unit/cipher.test.js tests/integration/messages-integration.test.js tests/e2e/chat_e2e.test.js tests/smoke/smoke.test.js tests/smoke/routes-smoke.test.js)
Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret npx playwright test --config=playwright.e2e.config.js)
Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.js)

Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.js --grep "23\\.|24\\.|25\\.|26\\.|27\\.|28\\.|29\\.|30\\." tests/playwright/messenger.e2e.spec.js)
Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.js tests/playwright/messaging.spec.js)
Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret npx playwright test --config=playwright.config.js --workers=1 tests/playwright/messaging.spec.js)
Bash(NODE_ENV=test MESSENGER_DB_PATH=:memory: JWT_SECRET=test-secret node --test tests/unit/validation.test.js tests/unit/sanitize.test.js tests/unit/cipher.test.js tests/unit/csrf.test.js)
Bash(flutter test test/screens/register_screen_test.dart --name "shows error when passwords do not match")
